title: A Plague Descends
description: A virulent disease is sweeping through the population, sickening your followers and halting progress. Drastic measures may be required.

options.tooltip: Immediately lose 20% of your Followers, but the plague is stopped.

options.text: We will pray for their recovery.
options.tooltip: Lose all passive Follower generation for 120 seconds as the plague runs its course.
